<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Early if-conversion is for out-of-order CPUs that don&#39;t have a lot of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicable instructions. The goal is to eliminate conditional branches that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may mispredict.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions from both sides of the branch are executed specutatively, and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmov instruction selects the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This bypasses all other heuristics, so it should be set fairly high.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                 SSAIfConv</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SSAIfConv class performs if-conversion on SSA form machine code after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determining if it is possible. The class contains no heuristics; external</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code should be used to determine when if-conversion is a good idea.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SSAIfConv can convert both triangles and diamonds:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Triangle: Head              Diamond: Head</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              | \\                       /  \\&#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              |  \\                     /    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              |  &#91;TF&#93;BB              FBB    TBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              |  /                     \\    /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              | /                       \\  /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             Tail                       Tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions in the conditional blocks TBB and/or FBB are spliced into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Head block, and phis in the Tail block are converted to select instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-earlyifconversion-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/ssaifconv"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/ssaifconv">SSAIfConv</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42;TII;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;TRI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;MRI;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust cycles with downward saturation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861" lineLink="#aa60b0637ed507d64df59ff2dca00eca1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aa60b0637ed507d64df59ff2dca00eca1">adjCycles</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cyc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Delta) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Delta &lt; 0 &amp;&amp; Cyc + Delta &gt; Cyc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cyc + Delta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class to simplify emission of cycle counts into optimization remarks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles">Cycles</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles/#a7f3d7aaea8a8d49f9f3d3f921f02dfab"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles/#a7f3d7aaea8a8d49f9f3d3f921f02dfab">Key</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles/#a46ef960c731e9164815b557f6fc89494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles/#a46ef960c731e9164815b557f6fc89494">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-earlyifconversion-cpp-/#affc165838cd53f7b0efd216a3026d1f5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Remark&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a91921ada405fd6ba65dff028df047cb6">Remark</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab89f1db02887aa569176f0e29622eb47">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a91921ada405fd6ba65dff028df047cb6">Remark</a> &amp;R, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-earlyifconversion-cpp-/cycles">Cycles</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.Key, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.Value) &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.Value == 1 ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; cycle&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; cycles&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Apply cost model and heuristics to the if-conversion in IfConv.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return true if the conversion is a good idea.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EarlyIfConverter::shouldConvertIf() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stress testing mode disables all cost considerations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ab03b4c4121954359c7380f0e60888bf5">Stress</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not try to if-convert if the condition has a high chance of being</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predictable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42;CurrentLoop = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonhardwareloops-cpp/#ada7c1594a393ede3ce32602d64d7ddb2">Loops</a>-&gt;getLoopFor(IfConv.Head);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the condition is in a loop, consider it predictable if the condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// itself or all its operands are loop-invariant. E.g. this considers a load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from a loop-invariant address predictable; we were unable to prove that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesn&#39;t alias any of the memory-writes in the loop, but it is likely to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// read to same value multiple times.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrentLoop &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(IfConv.Cond, &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (!MO.isReg() || !MO.isUse())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">          return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Register Reg = MO.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (Reg.isPhysical())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">          return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MachineInstr &#42;Def = MRI-&gt;getVRegDef(Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">        return CurrentLoop-&gt;isLoopInvariant(&#42;Def) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">               all&#95;of(Def-&gt;operands(), &#91;&amp;&#93;(MachineOperand &amp;Op) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 if (Op.isImm())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 if (!MO.isReg() || !MO.isUse())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 Register Reg = MO.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 if (Reg.isPhysical())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   return false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 MachineInstr &#42;Def = MRI-&gt;getVRegDef(Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 return CurrentLoop-&gt;isLoopInvariant(&#42;Def);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MinInstr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinInstr = Traces-&gt;getEnsemble(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08fc515218c080e73909645fecb41ed0ab5435d2dc82cf75225dd888985989f5a">MachineTraceStrategy::TS&#95;MinInstrCount</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> TBBTrace = MinInstr-&gt;getTrace(IfConv.getTPred());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> FBBTrace = MinInstr-&gt;getTrace(IfConv.getFPred());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;TBB: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; TBBTrace &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FBB: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; FBBTrace);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinCrit = std::min(TBBTrace.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#ab386e8d4cb8a7543effc5db3e6019920">getCriticalPath</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              FBBTrace.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#ab386e8d4cb8a7543effc5db3e6019920">getCriticalPath</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set a somewhat arbitrary limit on the critical path extension we accept.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CritLimit = SchedModel.MispredictPenalty/2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = &#42;IfConv.Head;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkemitter">MachineOptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#ace441594c4bd8da94fd64b1c612ca948">MORE</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getParent(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If-conversion only makes sense when there is unexploited ILP. Compute the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximum-ILP resource length of the trace after if-conversion. Compare it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the shortest critical path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const MachineBasicBlock&#42;, 1&gt;</a> ExtraBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IfConv.TBB != IfConv.Tail)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ExtraBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(IfConv.TBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResLength = FBBTrace.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#a3bab5c2e4f0b9a464665f79677b7f7e7">getResourceLength</a>(ExtraBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Resource length &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; ResLength</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, minimal critical path &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MinCrit &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ResLength &gt; MinCrit + CritLimit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not enough available ILP.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#ace441594c4bd8da94fd64b1c612ca948">MORE</a>.emit(&#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkmissed">MachineOptimizationRemarkMissed</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;IfConversion&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &lt;&lt; Cycles&#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;CritLimit&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, CritLimit&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume that the depth of the first head terminator will also be the depth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the select instruction inserted, as determined by the flag dependency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TBB / FBB data dependencies may delay the select even more.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">MachineTraceMetrics::Trace</a> HeadTrace = MinInstr-&gt;getTrace(IfConv.Head);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BranchDepth =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HeadTrace.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace/#a42762e6eab1667bcecdb77017b790040">getInstrCycles</a>(&#42;IfConv.Head-&gt;getFirstTerminator()).<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinetracemetrics/instrcycles/#aecec30fb7bb36797ee2c01f1c977a4b9">Depth</a>;</span></CodeLine>
